channel.title: Posts on Oscar Urselli
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Oscar Urselli

item.title: Poliba
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: I’m currently an undergraduate in computer engineering at the Polytechnic of Bari.

item.title: Olicyber 2023
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: For the second time, I made it to the national finals and won the bronze medal.

item.title: Liceo G. Moscati
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: Here I had a starting approach with C++, during the study I created some web sites for different projects. I also partecipated in various school competitions of chemistry, physics and mathematics. I graduated with 100 cum laude.

item.title: Itasec 2023 - 1st Highschool CTF Workshop
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: I helped in the organization of a workshop and a CTF for highschool students during ITASEC 2023. In particular, I and the members of Pwnzer0tt1 and M0NT3C4RL0 introduced the basics of cybersecurity. I covered the part related to OSINT.

item.title: Pwnzer0tt1
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: After CyberChallenge I and the other members of the team decided to create a CTF team called Pwnzer0tt1.

item.title: Cyberchallenge 2022
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: During the same period of the Olicyber, I also took part in this project for universities. Here I passed the selections and entered the official team of the Polytechnic of Bari with other 5 students.

item.title: Firegex
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: Firegex is a firewall that includes different functionalities, created for CTF Attack-Defence competitions that has the aim to limit or totally deny malicious traffic through the use of different kind of filters. More infos at this page… Development started about 2 weeks before the final of CyberChallenge.IT 2022. At the beginning, the idea was of having a way to block potential payload from other players until we where able to patch the exploited vulnerabilities.

item.title: Olicyber 2022
item.author: studio@oscarurselli.com (Oscar Urselli)
item.description: This project was my first encounter with cybersecurity. I managed to pass all the selections and won the bronze medal in the national finals.
